document.full_text: colorado's high-scoring forward paul stastny will miss the remainder of the nhl season with a leg injury, the avalanche announced in a statement on sunday.
document.title: avs' stastny to miss rest of season with leg injury
lines_and_colors: colorado's high-scoring forward paul stastny will miss the remainder of the nhl season with a leg injury, the avalanche announced in a statement on sunday.
